## PagingPosition enum

Available paging position where should be rendered

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum PagingPosition 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Bottom | <code>1</code> | Paging will be rendered below grid content |
|  Top | <code>0</code> | Paging will be rendered above grid content |
